definition: to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year
to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year

sentences.english: In a little while all the children piped up and began to dance.
sentences.chinese: 一会儿所有的孩子都开始载歌载舞起来。

sentences.english: Students were all in high spirits and many students went in front of the fire to sing songs or dance.
sentences.chinese: 同学们个个热情高涨，很多同学来到篝火前载歌载舞。

sentences.english: Singing and dancing, people celebrated National Day.
sentences.chinese: 人们载歌载舞庆祝国庆。

sentences.english: There is always a chorus of young men and women who sing and dance and often there is a pantomime horse.
sentences.chinese: 通常有载歌载舞的青年男女合唱队伍和一匹木马。

sentences.english: People have adequate reasons to the arrival of the festive singing and dancing.
sentences.chinese: 人们有足够的理由来载歌载舞迎接这个节日。

sentences.english: People have enough reason to dance to meet this festival.
sentences.chinese: 人们有足够的理由来载歌载舞迎接这个节日。

sentences.english: All night long, people dance and sing.
sentences.chinese: 整个夜晚人们载歌载舞。

sentences.english: We are not afraid to sing and dance, spreading our joy and including everyone when we are happy.
sentences.chinese: 我们从不吝于载歌载舞，在幸福时刻与大家共享欢乐。

sentences.english: I want to dance and sing .
Kirtan would be arranged and they would spend hours in dance and devotional music.
sentences.chinese: 他们会安排唱颂圣名，花数小时去载歌载舞。

sentences.english: Dozens of girls in cerise silk outfits broke into song and dance in the kindergarten schoolyard.
sentences.chinese: 紧接着，数十名身着丝质红衣的小女孩开始载歌载舞。

definition: to gather happily under one roof
lit. to celebrate peace with songs and dance (idiom)/fig. to make a show of happiness and prosperity
to sing at the top of one's voice (idiom)
to perform music/to play a tune
to be decorated with lanterns and colored banners (idiom)
to add to the fun/to liven things up
